title: brhadIshvarIm bhajarE citta
sahitya:
brhadIshvarIm bhajarE citta brahmEndrAdinuta jagajjananIm


anupallavi

 brhadIsha manOllAsa kAriNIm brahmANDa svarUpA kAriNIm 
mahA tripurasundarIm shrIkarIm lalitapancama rAgOdaya karIm


caraNam   nIrajadaLa nayanIm mrdu caraNIm niranjanIm tanjabhU vihAriNIm 
niratishaya sukha pradAyinIm nityAnanda guruguha rUpiNIm
